TopicTitle: So apparently Verizon update their speeds or something

Articles.Content:
I dunno what happened.

I went to work/school.

Came home.

Sister was screaming 'Verizon update their stuffs!'

and now our internet is doubley fast. Apparently this was a Verizon wide change or something

FiOS? If thats what it is its been out since 05. Its recently been expanding its availiblity. I got it last august. I still hate the fact that I dont have NASATV. I have like 10 internet enabled devices, not including the cable boxes.

No, like they just increased everyone\'s bandwidth basically.

Unless they put our whole town on FiOs.

But anyway, there was no setup at our house or anything. They just upped the bandwidth for everyone on Verizon (or just in our town, or region, or state, (I don\'t really know))

> 
> No, like they just increased everyone\'s bandwidth basically.
> 
> Unless they put our whole town on FiOs.
> 
> But anyway, there was no setup at our house or anything. They just upped the bandwidth for everyone on Verizon (or just in our town, or region, or state, (I don\'t really know))

I have unlimited bandwidth already ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif).
